name: lib/browser/electron/electron_finder_extention.js
attachFile
description:
Attach the file given with filePath.
Rather than setting it to the files attribute of the specified input element,
set it as the data-file-object attribute of the input element.
This is because the files attribute can not be rewritten by script

params.name: filePath
params.description: Specify the path of the file to be attached

params.name: options.fileType
params.description: type attribute of the File (see HTML5 File API)

params.name: options.replaceSubmitWithAjax
params.description: whether replace form-submit with ajax request, default is true.

name: replaceSubmitWithAjax
description:
Replace the behavior when form is submitted with ajax. And The behavior is below,
Send the request by including the File object specified in the data-file-object attribute of
the input element of type=file in the form.
When submit request get response 200:OK, call onSuccess callback with response object,
by default replace document.body by response.text() and message send with browserSocket on channel 'submit-ajax-done'.
When submit request get response 302:Redirect, call onRedirect callback with response object,
by default load the page of response.url, and pageLoaded event occur.
When submit request get response neither 200:OK or 302:Redirect, call onRespoinse callback with response object,
by default throw Error

params.name: callbacks
params.description: An object with callback with each attribute name

params.name: callbacks.onSuccess
params.description: callback function for handling response when status 200.

params.name: callbacks.onRedirect
params.description: callback function for handling response when status 302.

params.name: callbacks.onResponse
params.description: callback function for handling response when status is not 200 and 302.

attachFile

name: lib/page/finder.js
selectOption
description:
Set "selected" property true on option element whose textContent match the given string.
This method is assumed to be called on a select element

name: choose
description: Alias of "selectOption"

name: attachFile
description:
Attach the file given with filePath.
This method implemented at FinderExtentions by Browser. so please read api-document of FinderExtentions you use.

params.name: filePath
params.description: Specify the path of the file to be attached

params.name: options
params.description: options given to FinderExtentions

name: executeJs
description: execute "JavaScript code" given as argument

return.description: Promise which resolved with array of finder, that array length is matched number

name: every
description: return true if all elements which is found by Finder satisfied given filter

name: inIframe
description: Make this finder object executed in given iframe.

params.name: finderForIframe
params.description: finder object for iframe

name: clickAndWaitLoading
description: this is same for `page.waitForPageLoad(async ()=>{ await this.click() })`

name: clickAndWaitAjaxDone
description: this is same for `page.waitForAjaxDone(async ()=>{ await this.click() })`

name: lib/page/finder_action.js
FinderAction
description:
This class provides action methods for Finder.
This class is Mixined to "Finder" class

name: value
description: Get a value of element which is found first by Finder.

return.description: Promise resolved with element.value

name: attribute
description: Get a attribute of element which is found first by Finder.

return.description: Promise resolved with element.attributes[attrName].value

name: click
description: Click an element which is found first by Finder

return.description: Promise resolved after click event

name: count
description: Get a count of elements which is found by Finder.

return.description: Promise resolved with matched number
return true if count of elements which is found by Finder is over one.
return true if count of elements which is found by Finder is zero.

name: setValue
description: Set given value to value of all elements which is found by Finder

return.description: Promise resolved after setting value

name: fillIn
description: Alias of "setValue"

name: setText
description: Set given text to textContent of all elements which is found by Finder

return.description: Promise resolved after setting textContent

name: check
description: Set "checked" property true on all elements which is found by Finder

name: uncheck
description: Set "checked" property true on all elements which is found by Finder

name: chooseRadioButton
description: Alias of "click"

name: select
description: Set "selected" property true on element which is found by Finder

name: lib/page/finder_base.js

return.description: cloned object
self which have added conditions

name: toJsCode
description: generate and return javascript code for finding element by this finder object

return.description: Promise resolved in evaluated JavaScript code

name: lib/page/finder_filter.js
FinderFilter
description:
This class provides filtering methods for Finder.
This class is Mixined to "Finder" class

return.description: return function code to select elements which have given content as element.textContent
return function code to select elements which do not have given content as element.textContent

name: haveText
description: Alias of haveContent

return.description: return function code to select elements which have given content as element.textContent

name: notHaveText
description: Alias of notHaveContent

return.description: return function code to select elements which do not have given content as element.textContent
return function code to select elements which have given value as element.value
return function code to select elements which do not have given value as element.value
return function code to select elements which has given value as element.checked attribute.
return function code to select elements which has given value as element.selected attribute.
return function code to select elements which has given value as element.disabled attribute.
return function code to select elements which has given value in element.classList attribute.
return function code to select elements which do not has given value in element.classList attribute.
return function code to select elements which has given value in window.getComputedStyle(element)
return function code to select elements which do not has given value in window.getComputedStyle(element)

name: isClickable
description: return css selector string to select clickable elements like a, button, input[type=button]

name: indexOf
description: return function code to select elements which is in given index in elements

return.description: return filtered Finder object which has the specified value
return filtered Finder object which does not have the specified value
return filtered Finder object which has the specified text
return filtered Finder object which does not have the specified text
return filtered Finder object which has the specified text
return filtered Finder object which does not have the specified text
return filtered Finder object which has been checked
return filtered Finder object which do not has been checked
return filtered Finder object which has been selected
return filtered Finder object which do not has been selected
return filtered Finder object which has specified CssClass
return filtered Finder object which do not has specified CssClass
return filtered Finder object which has specified CssProperty
return filtered Finder object which do not has specified CssProperty
return filtered Finder object which is clickable like a, button, input[type=button]
return filtered Finder object which is in given index in elements
return Finder for the first matched element. this is same to "indexOf(0)"

name: lib/page/page.js

return.description: BrowserPage Object(Instance will be relayed on Browser used)
Window Object which contains this page.
Page Object provided by Each Browser

name: load
description: Load new page which is URL given, and returned Promise is resolved when finished load.

name: waitLoading
description:
When string given, load given URL page. Otherwise, wait for finish page load.
This is same for `page.load()` or `page.waitForPageLoad()`

name: url
description: URL of current page

name: waitForPageLoad
description: Wait loading for contents in new page.

params.name: action
params.description: A function representing the operation of loading new page.

name: waitForDownload
description:
Wait file-download completed and resolve the promise with result object(contains filename, savedFilePath)
A File is saved in config.fileDownloadDir with timestamp string like '20171225002540_print.pdf'

params.name: action
params.description: A function representing the operation of file download

params.name: options
params.description: options for downloading

return.description: object have property "filename" and "savedFilePath"

name: waitForNewWindow
description: Wait new-window opend and resolve the promise with Window object.

params.name: action
params.description: A function representing the operation of open new window

params.name: channel
params.description: string of representing the channel of Browser Socket Message. default is 'asynchronous-message-channel'.

params.name: action
params.description: A function representing the operation of sending Browser Socket Message

params.name: action
params.description: A function representing the operation of sending Ajax request

name: waitForConfirm

params.name: confirmOption
params.description: specify message property(default undefined), and isClickOK property(default true)

params.name: action
params.description: A function representing the operation of open confirm dialog

params.name: code
params.description: JavaScript Code for executing this page.

name: find
description: Create and Return new Finder object with given finder-condition

name: inIframe
description: Create and Return new Page object in given iframe context.

params.name: finderForIframe
params.description: finder object for iframe

name: getSourceHTML
description: Get the HTML source of current page.

return.description: resolved by current HTML source.

name: lib/page/window.js

return.description: BrowserWindow Object(Provided by Each Browser)

name: close
description: close this BrowserWindow();

name: page
description: get Page object in this window.

return.description: Browser Object(Instance will be relayed on Browser used)

name: removeWindow
description: remove window referrence, but not destroy window object.

name: removeWindowById
description: remove window referrence, but not destroy window object.

Config

name: lib/walker/walker.js

content:
# pagewalker

Pagewalker is a framework for scripting a browser.

## API Document

https://xketanaka.github.io/pagewalker/
